name: 英文（三）：學術英文（聽力與口說）
comment: *適合中初級程度以上同學修習。
restrict: ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】 ◎課程開放上修
description: 本課程著重聽、說兩項能力訓練，透過聆聽多媒體語言素材，觀賞並討論多元情境內容，以提昇學生理解不同情境所聽到的英語內容，且能簡要發表個人意見。
goals: 增進學生英語溝通表達能力
透過參與課程活動促進團隊精神
透過多面向英語閱讀促使學生了解多元文化，拓展學生國際化視野
透過課堂討論培養批判精神
提升學生英語學習動機及自主學習興趣
syllabus:
Course Objective (當然客觀的)  
This special blended learning course will help students to learn and develop valuable professional and   
academic “Speaking and Listening” English communication skills necessary to be successful in academic   
and professional circles nationally and globally, as well as, help achieve higher scores on the speaking and   
listening sections of the IELTS and/or TOFEL.   
In this course, we will also focus on learning and practice certain key aspects for developing academic   
speaking and listening skills such as pronunciation, listening strategies, discourse pattern recognition &   
cohesion, effective grammatical sentence structuring – extended speech, and so forth that are important and   
necessary to achieving proficient English oral and aural communication skills.  
This course will also involve the use of the latest technological tools for language learning enhancement   
such as: 1) Flipped Classroom Technology & 2) Digital Game-based Learning
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【共同英文(一)】◎必須先修過【共同英文(二)】
